title: Novo Nordisk CEO on Hims Suit, Wegovy Demand and Pricing
description: Novo Nordisk says more than 246,000 people are now taking its weight-loss pill. CEO Mike Doustdar sits down with Bloomberg’s Katie Greifeld to discuss GLP-1 supply, pricing and the company’s lawsuit against Hims over alleged obesity drug copycats. (Source: Bloomberg)
